name: Caroline's Working 2
description:
The new restaurant where Caroline’s working is in crisis again!!
The warehouse is food flooded, kitchen is a mess, and we’re short in hands!
But we account on you, Caroline, the girl who can leverage magic power behind warehouse!
Go! Caroline!

※ Eliminate food in the same color and keep conveyor belt working!
※ Unwrap sealed foods, tidy dishes, too busy to daze.
※ Disclose secrets behind warehouse: sealed bombs, lovely fairy, and that, horrific sound…
※ New challenge from new elements: Squid, Big Present Box and Steel Chain!
※ Wonder items from treasure boxes will be your best friends to clean up the warehouse!
※ Now you have new secret weapons. New machines, not just the Task Machine, will help you in different ways.

【Features】
※ Neat pictures
Colorful fresh foods and mystery fairies. You can always find new fun stuff.

※ Improvising music
Don’t forget how it feels in a great restaurant. Keep that in mind and overcome any difficulties.

※ Easy to play
Eliminating, bombing, and moving forward to somewhere deep in the warehouse! Disclose all secrets is not that easy!

※ Various elements
Coin, treasure, and tricks by fairies. Some of them can be pleasant, and some of them are really troubles!


【About us】
Soul Game Innovative & Outstanding
Support: support@soulgame.com
